FROM BOARD JOIN MEMBER ON (BOARD_WRITER = USER_NO) WHERE BOARD.STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_TYPE = 1
LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC
